member.name: T:SimpleCMS.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageConfig
member.summary: Use this class to customize the Help Page. For example you can set a custom to supply the documentation or you can provide the samples for the requests/responses.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets CLR types that are used as the content of or .

member.summary: Gets the objects that are used directly as samples for certain actions.

member.name: P:SimpleCMS.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjects
member.summary: Gets the objects that are serialized as samples by the supported formatters.

member.name: P:SimpleCMS.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjectFactories
member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.summary: Gets the request or response body samples.

member.name: T:SimpleCMS.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator
member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:SimpleCMS.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:SimpleCMS.Areas.HelpPage.SampleDirection
member.summary: Indicates whether the sample is used for request or response

member.name: T:SimpleCMS.Areas.HelpPage.TextSample
member.summary: This represents a preformatted text sample on the help page. There's a display template named TextSample associated with this class.

member.name: M:SimpleCMS.DAL.CustomSqlExecutionStrategy.#ctor
member.summary: The default retry limit is 5, which means that the total amount of time spent between retries is 26 seconds plus the random factor.

member.name: M:SimpleCMS.DAL.CustomSqlExecutionStrategy.#ctor(System.Int32,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of "PharylonExecutionStrategy" with the specified limits for number of retries and the delay between retries.
member.param: The maximum number of retry attempts.
The maximum delay in milliseconds between retries.

member.name: M:SimpleCMS.Enum.EnumHelper.GetDescription(System.Enum)
member.summary: http://weblogs.asp.net/grantbarrington/enumhelper-getting-a-friendly-description-from-an-enum Retrieve the description on the enum, e.g. [Description("Bright Pink")] BrightPink = 2, Then when you pass in the enum, it will retrieve the description
member.returns: A string representing the friendly name
